phrases: I entered middle school when I was twelve.
In ninth grade I applied for Kitahoro High School, since it was nearby.
And then in the spring of my fifteenth year, I met you.
If only I could be like Kazehaya-kun...
Maybe then something will change for me too.”
You have always been the first step for me.
This year was too different for me.
It will take too long to describe.
Sorry, I guess that was boring.
I will try to have a different vibe next year.
You already do, for the better.
You are easier to talk to.
You are going to ruin the makeup Ayane-chan did for me.
You have always had a good vibe.
You were smiling, even before the entrance ceremony.
Then we were in the same class,
but I have not seen you smile like that since.
I have been wondering what kind of person you were.
I did not think you would remember when we first met.
I thought you would be a good person,
I guess I can assume he thinks I am a good person.
You changed a lot today too; you scared me.
I did not mean to scare you.
See, that is not what I meant.
Let us line up to visit the shrine.
You already do, for the better.
You wished you were cute when you met Kurumi, did not you?
Think about why you want to be cute.
Ayane-chan, there is only one answer to that.
It is too hard to say.
You were cuter than I thought.
I used to want to be more like Kazehaya-kun.
Now I want him to think I am cute, if only just a little.
How long are we doing this for?
Until Joe gets bored of Yano-chin?
It is probably full of holes from the sparks.
He came all the way here.
You did not really explain why you dragged him around, did you?
I will hook you up with ramen next time.
Why did you ditch us like that?
I could not put up with it.
Why do not you be a bit more friendly?
even if they bump into someone they know,
You are having too much fun.
But I wanted to see them.
Besides, I do not think you need to worry about them.
It looks like they are doing well.
So I am going to have sweet sake and go home.
You are visiting the shrine with me.
Best regards for the new year.
Y-You too, best regards for the new year.
They are from Chizu-chan and Ayane-chan.
Are not you going to respond?
They beat me to texting her.
Best regards for the new year.
So much of what happened last year were firsts for me.
All the things I thought about,
It is all because I met all of you.
My brother's coming over on New Year's Day.
You do not remember her name yet, do you?
She is going to be your sister-in-law soon, is not she?
Ryu, if something ever happens to you, I will comfort you.
Let us see what our fortunes will be like.
All will be as you wish.”
Beware of your temper; be composed and approach everything with calmness.
Take heed of the advice of others.”
I think I am too greedy these days.
I heard Bad” is actually pretty good.
Because it is not too common.
You are supposed to hang these up on trees, are not you?
I think I would absorb your good fortune.
I have always had good luck.
I want to give it to you.
It is sort of a shabby birthday present, but...
Now that I think of it, I do not know why I was not sure I liked him.
How did I see him only with admiration all that time?
Wow, I spent New Year's Eve with Ayane.
You said you would be at the bonfire.
Sorry about my idiot of a son.
All these holes in your jacket.
You are not getting any new year's allowance.
Dear God, please erase the fact that I spent New Year's Eve with Joe.
That is all I ask for.
I guess I will not need to get my fortune then.
But man, they really look like a normal couple when they are like that.
Let us go drink a little.
He would score with some totally random pick-up.
That bastard says he is going to his girlfriend's for the new year.
Do not look him in the face.
Do not people tell you you are cute?
Anything to say about guys with glasses?
Let us be together in our next lives!
What, you think you are good enough to get picked up?
Are you that idiot from earlier?
I am not interested in brats.
You are embarrassing me, go away.
This is where I first met you.
What will this year be like?
Look, you see that empty house?
Hey, do not leave me here!
Hey, Kurumi, did you make a wish?
Hey, why do not we hang out together?
Is not Sawako coming home yet?
I wonder if I can change my temper.
I do not think I can.
Guy next to me in class”but not my friend.
He is more distant than a friend, and I want him to be more than a friend.
I just want to know if it is for eternity or not
I wish I could live like this forever, but...
I want to be like those paper airplanes filling the sky
and I will find only one
Thank you, love grows with being needed
If only I could smile and enjoy the distance between us
I want to tell you the thoughts he accumulated
What can I do in a world like that where nobody notices me?
I just want to know if it is for eternity or not
I wish I could live like this forever, but...
I want to be like those paper airplanes filling the sky
If the two of us accepted each other more
Look at me just a little bit
Flower of love blowing in the wind
